In this lesson, I learned to enhance ggplot maps by using the `{ggspatial}` package to add north arrows and scale annotations, and the `{ggsflabel}` package to incorporate text and labels effectively.

For more insights, check it out on [this site](https://lawaloa.github.io/layers/){target="_blank"}.
